errors.name: InvalidDisablePoolAuthorityListData
errors.msg: Invalid disable pool authority list data

errors.name: InvalidLstIndex
errors.msg: LST with given index does not exist

errors.name: LstInputDisabled
errors.msg: Input is currently disabled for this LST

errors.name: PoolWouldLoseSolValue
errors.msg: Cannot allow loss of SOL value for pool

errors.name: LstStillHasValue
errors.msg: Cannot remove LST when reserves or protocol fee accumulator not empty or SOL value not synced

errors.name: IndexTooLarge
errors.msg: Provided list index argument is too large

errors.name: InvalidDisablePoolAuthorityIndex
errors.msg: Disable Pool Authority with given index does not exist

errors.name: UnauthorizedDisablePoolAuthoritySigner
errors.msg: Signer is not authorized to operate on given disable pool authority

errors.name: InvalidDisablePoolAuthority
errors.msg: Given disable pool authority is not valid

errors.name: UnauthorizedSetRebalanceAuthoritySigner
errors.msg: Signer is not authorized to set rebalance authority

errors.name: IncorrectDisablePoolAuthorityList
errors.msg: Incorrect disable pool authority list account

errors.name: FeeTooHigh
errors.msg: Attempting to set a fee over 100%

errors.name: NotEnoughFees
errors.msg: Not enough fees to complete protocol fees withdrawal

errors.name: ZeroValue
errors.msg: Input or output value is zero. Size likely too small.
